name: WIZARD Card Game
description:
The official Wizard Card Game on Android

Not ready to buy the full version? Try the free trial version first.

If you enjoy trick-taking card games you will love Wizard. It's simply the best of the best!

Features:
Original and Medieval decks.
Play against 3, 4, or 5 computer players.
Three game types: Normal, 1 to 10, 1 to 10 back to 1.
Two Bid types: Normal, Simultaneous.
